named-query.name: selectTopicosdomarcadorpai
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Topico obj WHERE obj.id.marcadorpai LIKE ?

named-query.name: selectCollaborators
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Colaborador obj WHERE obj.id.tipodecolaborador LIKE ? AND obj.id.coordenador != 1

named-query.name: selectCollaboratorsOthers
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Colaborador obj WHERE obj.id.tipodecolaborador IS NULL OR obj.id.tipodecolaborador LIKE ?

named-query.name: selectCollaboratorsCoordinators
named-query.query: SELECT col FROM Colaborador as col WHERE col.coordenador = 1

named-query.name: selectCollaboratorsPublications
named-query.query: SELECT pul FROM ColaboradorXPublicacao pul WHERE pul.id.idColaborador = ?

named-query.name: selectPublications
named-query.query: SELECT pub FROM Publicacao pub WHERE pub.id.estado = ?

named-query.name: selectUsuario
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Usuario as obj WHERE login = ? AND senha = MD5(?)
